reason: Fed Policy Shock: FOMC_SURPRISE - FOMC minutes released within the last 48 hours revealed a hawkish surprise, showing that several officials are open to further interest rate hikes if inflation progress stalls.

payload.summary: FOMC minutes released within the last 48 hours revealed a hawkish surprise, showing that several officials are open to further interest rate hikes if inflation progress stalls.
payload.market_impact: Positive for USD (yield support); Negative for Gold and commodities due to increased 'higher-for-longer' interest rate expectations.
